p.d: This week we dial up 2x Pipe Master Jeremy Flores from his home Tahiti for the Q&A with Cote. Kael Walsh breaks down the filming of his internet-shattering surf edit "Soft Serve." Peter Mel catches up with Lucas Chianca to talk Nazare and slab hunting in Brazil with Italo Ferreira. Plus, for our Good Vibes of the Week, Coco Ho gives us her at-home training tips!
